Details.Name: Course Launcher Staggered Deploy
Details.Description: Blueprint with preconfigured setup & teardown processes.Deploys Apps and resolves connections on Setup, and deletes App VMs on Teardown

GlobalInput.Name: Cloudshell Group
GlobalInput.Description: Must be Valid Cloudshell Group. Group also needs domain permissions.

GlobalInput.Name: Participants List
GlobalInput.Description: comma separated list of partipants (must be valid cloudshell users)

GlobalInput.Name: Concurrent Deploy Limit
GlobalInput.Description: How many concurrent sandboxes to deploy at once

GlobalInput.Name: Health Check First Sandbox
GlobalInput.Description: Boolean. Check first sandbox and stop if fails.

GlobalInput.Name: Sandbox Global Inputs
GlobalInput.Description: key-value pairs to be forwarded to global inputs. Semicolon joined pairs. (key1,val1;key2,val2)
